ruleset.name: Oxid Certification Rules
ruleset.description: This rule set file contains the configuration for the Oxid Module Certification.

rule.name: CyclomaticComplexity
rule.message: Method {0}::{1}() has a Cyclomatic Complexity of {2}, this metric should have a maximum of {3}.
rule.description: Complexity is determined by the number of decision points in a method plus one for the method entry. The decision points are 'if', 'while', 'for', and 'case labels'. Generally, 1-4 is low complexity, 5-7 indicates moderate complexity, 8-10 is high complexity, and 11+ is very high complexity.

property.name: showClassesComplexity
property.description: Indicate if class average violation should be added to the report

property.name: showMethodsComplexity
property.description: Indicate if class average violation should be added to the report

rule.name: NPathComplexity
rule.message: Method {0}::{1}() has a NPath Complexity of {2}, this metric should have a maximum of {3}.
rule.description: The NPath complexity of a method is the number of acyclic execution paths through that method. A threshold of 200 is generally considered the point where measures should be taken to reduce complexity.

rule.name: Coverage
rule.message: Method {0}::{1} has a Code Coverage of {2}%, this metric should at least be a {3}%.
rule.description: Checks the code coverage of methods and functions and tests the given value against the configured threshold.

rule.name: CrapIndex
rule.message: Method {0}::{1}() has a C.R.A.P. Index of {2}, this metric should have a maximum of {3}.
rule.description: Checks the crap index of methods and functions and tests the given value against the configured threshold.
